name: Pipe Puzzle Hacking
description:
There is no narrative, just a pipe puzzle game. Hopefully you will feel more like a hacker by the end of this.

Type in the number of the row and column you would like to lock on to and spin it.  Once you are satisfied with the position, hit Spacebar to move on to select another tile. Spin all the pipes until all the Targets light up! But be careful, the antivirus might set up some decoy Targets to throw you off!

Everything is made with ASCII text and no controller support either.

Only in three difficulties: Easy, Normal & Hard 

Controls:

  • Option: Number Keys
  • Confirm (Selection / Action): Enter
  • Spin Left / Right: Arrow Keys Left / Right
  • Select Another Tile: Spacebar (After spinning a tile)
  • Exit Game: Alt + F4 / Close Window
